description_content: As a Systems and Computing Engineer, I have solid foundations in the whole life cycle of software development, from the analysis and design, to the implementation and maintenance.
Thanks to a project-based learning methodology, I have developed teamwork skills and a problem-solving mindset.

I've taken around 60 courses on Software Development. Moreover, I've completed the "Full Stack Developer with JavaScript" career path, which includes 20 courses, multiple hands-on projects, and a final exam, receiving a physical diploma.
